overview: Azman (Mustapha Kamal), the brother of Wati (Erra Fazira) has been tried and sentenced to two years in prison for setting fire to Awie's (Awie) house. Meanwhile, Wati has completed her studies and taken over the company of her late father to replace her brother who is still in prison. Awie and Wati's relationship is going well and they are planning to get engaged. But the deck due to their busy schedule makes the engagement delayed and Ziana (Ziana Zain) who is still obsessed with Awie continues her cunning plan to seduce Awie to fall into his trap again.
title: Sembilu II
